name: Cat Stranding (Aleksandr Nariadchikov, SoloEkat, IzhBXB, NordFox, CupOfPride)
name_original: Cat Stranding (Aleksandr Nariadchikov, SoloEkat, IzhBXB, NordFox, CupOfPride)
description:
A first-person adventure game in a minimalistic and mysterious setting.

The world of the game is dying, we need to save souls of cats that remained on it, having managed to leave that world afterwards, to meet new horizons and new life...

🎮 Controls

Keyboard:
- Moving - WASD
- Camera Rotation - Mouse
- Jump - Spacebar
- Double Jump - Spacebar
- Wall Climbing - Spacebar (hold it in front of the walls)
- Fire - Left Mouse Button
- Highlight objectives - 'E'
- Crouch - Left Ctrl
- Pause - Esc

Gamepad (PS4 layout):
- Moving - Left Thumbstick
- Camera Rotation - Right Thumbstick
- Jump - L1
- Double Jump - L1
- Wall Climbing - L1 (hold it in front of the walls)
- Fire - R2
- Highlight objectives - R3
- Crouch - L2
- Pause - Options

Ⓘ About

This game was made in 7 days for 2019 Epic MegaJam.

We are new team of two coders/game designers, tech artist, 3d artist and sound designer.

Unfortunately, we haven't managed to end everything that we wanted to do during the jam, but we were so close... We are sorry that we haven't shipped game with ending due jam submission deadline... But you still can experience main game loop and explore the map, which is unique for each game session!

Hope, you will enjoy the gameplay, share your feedback with us, and we will polish and finish the game after the jam judging ends.

Try to climb above the clouds, it worth it!

♡ Thank you for playing ♡

P.S. Collecting 5+ cats will give you a cue what will be next:)
